p: In accordance with previously published data, 1 is the main component [ 1, 46], its content varying from 5.0 to 85%. However, estragole [ 47, 48], fenchyl acetate [ 7] and limonene [ 6] have also been reported as main components of the fennel oil from other origins. Fennel essential oil is known as a source for anethole [ 49].
